Jx.Grid

Extends: Jx.Widget

A tabular control that has fixed, optional, scrolling headers on the rows and columns like a spreadsheet.

Jx.Grid is a tabular control with convenient controls for resizing columns, sorting, and inline editing.  It is created inside another element, typically a div.  If the div is resizable (for instance it fills the page or there is a user control allowing it to be resized), you must call the resize() method of the grid to let it know that its container has been resized.

When creating a new Jx.Grid, you can specify a number of options for the grid that control its appearance and functionality.  You can also specify plugins to load for additional functionality.  Currently Jx provides the following plugins

Prelighterprelights rows, columns, and cells
Selectorselects rows, columns, and cells
Sortersorts rows by specific column
Editorallows editing of cells if the column permits editing

Jx.Grid renders data that comes from an external source.  This external source, called the store, must be a Jx.Store or extended from it.

Events

gridCellEnter(cell, list)called when the mouse enters a cell
gridCellLeave(cell, list)called when the mouse leaves a cell
gridCellClick(cell)called when a cell is clicked
gridRowEnter(cell, list)called when the mouse enters a row header
gridRowLeave(cell, list)called when the mouse leaves a row header
gridRowClick(cell)called when a row header is clicked
gridColumnEnter(cell, list)called when the mouse enters a column header
gridColumnLeave(cell, list)called when the mouse leaves a column header
gridColumnClick(cell)called when a column header is clicked
gridMouseLeave()called when the mouse leaves the grid at any point.

Summary
Jx.GridExtends: Jx.Widget
Options
parentthe HTML element to create the grid inside.
columnsan object consisting of a columns array that defines the individuals columns as well as containing any options for Jx.Grid.Columns or a Jx.Grid.Columns object itself.
rowEither a Jx.Grid.Row object or a json object defining options for the class
storeAn instance of Jx.Store
Constructor
Jx.Grid

Options

parent

the HTML element to create the grid inside.  The grid will resize to fill the domObj.

columns

an object consisting of a columns array that defines the individuals columns as well as containing any options for Jx.Grid.Columns or a Jx.Grid.Columns object itself.

row

Either a Jx.Grid.Row object or a json object defining options for the class

store

An instance of Jx.Store

Constructor

Jx.Grid

Functions

render

render: function()

Create the grid for the current model

TODO

very hacky!  can plugins ‘wantEvent’ between init and render?

Functions

resize

resize: function()

resize the grid to fit inside its container.  This involves knowing something about the model it is displaying (the height of the column header and the width of the row header) so nothing happens if no model is set

setStore

setStore: function(store)

set the store for the grid to display.  If a store is attached to the grid it is removed and the new store is displayed.

Parameters

store{Object} the store to use for this grid

getStore

getStore: function()

gets the store set for this grid.

TODO

consider moving whole thing into Jx.Columns ??

create a suitable column representation for everything in the store that doesn’t already have a representation

Functions

addRow

addRow: function (store,
record,
position)

Adds a row to the table.  Can add to either the beginning or the end based on passed flag

updateRow

updateRow: function(index)

update a single row in the grid

Parameters

indexthe row to update

removeRow

removeRow: function (store,
index)

remove a single row from the grid

Parameters

store index

removeRows

removeRows: function (store,
first,
last)

removes multiple rows from the grid

Parameters

store index

setColumnWidth

setColumnWidth: function(column,
width)

set the width of a column in pixels

Parameters

column width

Base class for all widgets (visual classes) in the JxLib Framework.
